question: 長靴
sourceMnemonic: <kanji>Long</kanji> <kanji>shoes</kanji> aren't long in that the feet part are long (that wouldn't make sense). Instead, the top part is long, making them into <vocabulary>boots</vocabulary>.
sourceReadingMnemonic: The reading is a bit weird. Double kun'yomi, so think along the lines of <ja>長い</ja> and <ja>靴</ja> getting added together. <ja>靴</ja> is the reading you learned with the kanji, however. It also gets rendaku'd.
